text: Ia manmaghɨn nɨghnɨsi? Kɨ ian navibar amutɨ da deraghasa, kɨ ti mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam gami? O kɨ Godɨn navim damutɨ a deraghasa, kɨ ti mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam gami? Kɨ gumazibar damazimɨn ziam iniasa, mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam gami, o? Bar puvatɨ. Kɨ ingangarir kam damu, gumazibar damazimɨn ziam iniva, egh kamaghɨn kɨ Kraisɨn ingangarir gumazimɨn ikian kogham.
